fusilli.fusionmodels.tabularimagefusion.denoise_tab_img_mapsÔÉÅ

Denoising autoencoder for tabular data concatenated with image feature maps

Classes

DAETabImgMaps(pred_type,¬†data_dims,¬†params)

Using a denoising autoencoder to upsample tabular data, then concatenating with feature maps from final 3 conv layers of image data.

DenoisingAutoencoder(data_dims)

Denoising autoencoder for tabular data: pytorch lightning module.

ImgUnimodalDAE(data_dims,¬†pred_type,¬†...)

Image unimodal network to go alongside the tabular denoising autoencoder: pytorch lightning module.

denoising_autoencoder_subspace_method(datamodule)

Class containing the method to train the denoising autoencoder and to convert the image data to the latent image space.
class DAETabImgMaps(pred_type, data_dims, params)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: ParentFusionModel, Module

Using a denoising autoencoder to upsample tabular data, then concatenating with feature maps from final 3 conv layers of image data. From Yan et al 2021: Richer fusion network for breast cancer classification on multimodal data.

pred_typeÔÉÅ

Type of prediction.

Type:

str

subspace_methodÔÉÅ

Subspace method: denoising_autoencoder_subspace_method.

Type:

class

fusion_layersÔÉÅ

Fusion layers combining the intermediate image maps and the tabular latent subspace.

Type:

nn.Sequential

final_predictionÔÉÅ

Final prediction layers.

Type:

nn.Sequential

class denoising_autoencoder_subspace_method(datamodule, k=None, max_epochs=1000, train_subspace=True)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

Class containing the method to train the denoising autoencoder and to convert the image data to the latent image space.

datamoduleÔÉÅ

Data module containing the data.

Type:

pl.LightningDataModule

dae_trainerÔÉÅ

Trainer for the denoising autoencoder.

Type:

pl.Trainer

img_unimodal_trainerÔÉÅ

Trainer for the image unimodal network.

Type:

pl.Trainer

autoencoderÔÉÅ

Tabular denoising autoencoder.

Type:

DenoisingAutoencoder

img_unimodalÔÉÅ

Image unimodal network.

Type:

ImgUnimodalDAE

__init__(datamodule, k=None, max_epochs=1000, train_subspace=True)[source]ÔÉÅ
Parameters:

  • datamodule (pl.LightningDataModule) ‚Äì Data module containing the data.

  • k (int or None) ‚Äì Number of subspaces. Default is None.

  • max_epochs (int) ‚Äì Maximum number of epochs. Default is 1000.

  • train_subspace (bool) ‚Äì Whether to train the subspace models. Default is True.

convert_to_latent(test_dataset)[source]ÔÉÅ

Convert the image data to the latent image space.

Parameters:

test_dataset (Dataset) ‚Äì Test dataset.

Returns:

  • list ‚Äì List containing the raw tabular data and the latent image space.

  • pd.DataFrame ‚Äì Dataframe containing the labels.

  • list ‚Äì List containing the dimensions of the data.

load_ckpt(checkpoint_path)[source]ÔÉÅ

Load the checkpoint of the subspace models

Parameters:

checkpoint_path (list) ‚Äì Paths to the checkpoints. The checkpoint list must be a list of checkpoint elements containing the state dict of the subspace models.

train(train_dataset, val_dataset)[source]ÔÉÅ

Train the latent image space.

Parameters:

  • train_dataset (Dataset) ‚Äì Training dataset.

  • val_dataset (Dataset) ‚Äì Validation dataset.

Returns:

  • list ‚Äì List containing the raw tabular data and the latent image space.

  • pd.DataFrame ‚Äì Dataframe containing the labels.
